com.demshape.factorization.datastructure

Class DatasetIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.demshape.factorization.datastructure.DatasetIO

  • public class DatasetIO
extends Object
    Class which holds all IO operations.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int numberOfLines(Reader input)
      Returns number of lines for an input reader.
      static void readColumnBased(String filepath, DatasetInterface dataset)
      Read a data set from a txt file in column based format. 1st column: item a (int) 2nd column: item b (int) 3rd column: similarity between item a and item b e.g. number of co-occurrences (float)
      static Map<Integer,SparseVector> readFeatures(Reader input)
      Reads in additional side information per item.

      Reads in latent vectors from an input file.

      Read a data set from a txt file in row based format.
      static void shuffle(Reader input, Writer output, int bufferSize)
      Shuffles a given input data set.

      Randomly splits rows of an input file into two files based on a given ratio.

      Writes a vector of biases to an output file.

      Writes latens vectors to a given writer

    • Method Detail

      • readColumnBased

        public static void readColumnBased(String filepath,
                                   DatasetInterface dataset)
                            throws IOException
        Read a data set from a txt file in column based format. 1st column: item a (int) 2nd column: item b (int) 3rd column: similarity between item a and item b e.g. number of co-occurrences (float)
        Parameters:
        filepath - Path to input file
        dataset - A dataset instance to read into
        Throws:
        IOException - if path is not readable

      • readRowBased

        public static int[][] readRowBased(String filepath)
                            throws IOException
        Read a data set from a txt file in row based format. Each row of the data set contains interactions of a single user. All entries are ids. user_a interaction_1 interaction_2 interaction_3... user_b interaction_1 interaction_2 interaction_3...
        Parameters:
        filepath - Path to input file
        Returns:
        A two dimensional array representing the parsed input file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if path is not readable

      • splitToFile

        public static void splitToFile(Reader input,
                               Writer output1,
                               Writer output2,
                               double ratio)
                        throws IOException
        Randomly splits rows of an input file into two files based on a given ratio.
        Parameters:
        input - A reader representing the input file
        output1 - A writer for the first part
        output2 - A writer for the second part
        ratio - Ratio to split. 0.5 = 50%
        Throws:
        IOException - if writer is not writable

      • numberOfLines

        public static int numberOfLines(Reader input)
                         throws IOException
        Returns number of lines for an input reader.
        Parameters:
        input - A reader
        Returns:
        Number of lines.
        Throws:
        IOException - if reader is not readable

      • write

        public static void write(Map<Integer,org.jblas.FloatMatrix> latentVectors,
                         Writer writer)
                  throws IOException
        Writes latens vectors to a given writer
        Parameters:
        latentVectors - A mapping from id to a latent vector
        writer - A writer for the output
        Throws:
        IOException - if writer is not writable

      • write

        public static void write(org.jblas.FloatMatrix w1,
                         Writer writer)
                  throws IOException
        Writes a vector of biases to an output file.
        Parameters:
        w1 - One dimensionsal vector containing biases of a model.
        writer - A writer to write to
        Throws:
        IOException - if writer is not writable

      • readLatentVectors

        public static Map<Integer,org.jblas.FloatMatrix> readLatentVectors(Reader input)
                                                            throws IOException
        Reads in latent vectors from an input file.
        Parameters:
        input - Input reader.
        Returns:
        A mapping from item id to its latent vector
        Throws:
        IOException - if input is not readable

      • shuffle

        public static void shuffle(Reader input,
                           Writer output,
                           int bufferSize)
                    throws IOException
        Shuffles a given input data set.
        Parameters:
        input - Input reader
        output - Output writer
        bufferSize - number of lines to buffer before shuffling and flushing to disk.
        Throws:
        IOException - if writer is not writable

      • readFeatures

        public static Map<Integer,SparseVector> readFeatures(Reader input)
                                              throws IOException
        Reads in additional side information per item. The format is in sparse vector format: ITEM_ID FEATURE_ID:FEATURE_VALUE FEATURE_ID:FEATURE_VALUE...
        Parameters:
        input - Path to input reader
        Returns:
        A mapping from item id to a sparse vector
        Throws:
        IOException - if reader is not readable
